noun.description: A stupid, irritating, or contemptible person.

verb.description: Behave in a stupid way; waste time.
Make a botched attempt at something.
Not want to do something because one has no interest in or enthusiasm for it.

phrases: he felt disoriented: everything seemed to be arse about face
origin: Old English ærs, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch aars and German Arsch. See also ass.
